task.summary: Bump version for real this time
Try using smaller results and more tools
Make build ID optional for the lookup tools
Add a build scan tag for the MCP server
Truncate test results if there are too many
Take MCP roots into account, and use as default project root if there is only one
Invoke docs publishing from other workflows
Fix docs call from release, and limit its concurrency
Change JDK admonition to a warning
Add index page redirecting to latest, and root 404 page
